item.title: Submission
item.description: Submission Please submit your full or extended papers electronically through Open Review submission system, either in MS Word or LaTeX format. Should you encounter any issues during submission, feel free to reach out to the conference organizers at intersect.indonesia@gmail.com. Upon...

item.title: Registration
item.description: Registration Registration is mandatory for all symposium and competition participants. Please register through our registration system before the deadline. We cannot accommodate any last-minute registration. Registration Fees (in USD) Category Early Bird Normal Young Researcher Competition (High School Students) $10...

item.title: Young Researcher Competition
item.description: Young Researcher Competition (For High School Students) Welcome to the Young Researcher Competition, a unique opportunity for high school students in Indonesia to showcase their research skills and contribute to the theme of Indonesia at the Crossroad of Technology, Sustainability,...
